title: Shopify Product Lister / Data Entry Specialist
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce company looking for a highly detail-oriented Product Lister / Data Entry Specialist to help us optimize and upload product listings to our Shopify stores.

This is an initial full-time project (approx. 4 weeks), with the possibility of a long-term position for the right candidate.

If you’re meticulous, hard-working, and have experience listing products in Shopify, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

- Upload and edit product listings in Shopify
- Create unique and relevant product names for new listings
- Check and correct product variants
- Write new meta descriptions optimized for SEO (can use tools like ChatGPT)
- Edit and correct URL handles for consistency and SEO
- Ensure product descriptions include correct dimensions (Spanish language — translations tools can be used)
- Basic photo editing when required (cropping, resizing, optimizing)

Requirements:
? At least 6–12 months of hands-on experience working with Shopify product listings
? Proven attention to detail — you must be extremely accurate and precise
? Experience with basic photo editing tools (e.g., Canva, Photoshop, etc.)
? Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
? Willingness to work flexible hours and with a “no 9-to-5 mentality” (we work at a fast pace and expect full dedication during the project)
? Ability to communicate in English (written/spoken)
? Comfort using translation tools (for Spanish product content)

Work Conditions:

Full-time: 40+ hours per week, 5–7 days per week (flexible)

Duration: Approx. 1 month to start, with evaluation for potential long-term engagement

$4 USD per hour

Remote work from anywhere. Don't apply if you don't have experience with Shopify and or data entry.
